name: @modelcontextprotocol/dashboard
description: MCP Dashboard - Multi-server management and monitoring interface for Model Context Protocol
author: Anthropic, PBC (https://anthropic.com)

scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-cli
scripts.dev:sdk: npm run link:sdk && concurrently "npm run dev" "cd sdk && npm run build:esm:w"
scripts.link:sdk: (test -d sdk || ln -sf ${MCP_SDK:-$PWD/../typescript-sdk} sdk) && (cd sdk && npm link && (test -d node_modules || npm i)) && npm link @modelcontextprotocol/sdk
scripts.unlink:sdk: (cd sdk && npm unlink -g) && rm sdk && npm unlink @modelcontextprotocol/sdk
scripts.test: npm run prettier-check && cd client && npm test
scripts.lint: prettier --check . && cd client && npm run lint
scripts.publish-all: npm publish --workspaces --access public && npm publish --access public
scripts.kill: for port in 6286 6287; do lsof -ti:$port | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo "No process on port $port"; done
